name: Comprehensive Business Plan Development
description: Full workflow for creating a detailed business plan including market analysis, financial missionions, and strategic planning

nodes.title: Business Concept & Vision
nodes.description: Define the business concept, mission, vision, and core values. Establish the foundation and direction for the business plan.

nodes.title: Market Research & Analysis
nodes.description: Conduct comprehensive market research including industry analysis, target market identification, and market size estimation.

nodes.title: Competitive Analysis
nodes.description: Analyze direct and indirect competitors, their business models, pricing strategies, and market positioning to identify opportunities.

nodes.title: SWOT Analysis
nodes.description: Perform detailed SWOT analysis identifying strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats for the business.

nodes.title: Financial missionions
nodes.description: Create detailed financial missionions including revenue forecasts, expense budgets, cash flow analysis, and break-even calculations.
nodes.customPrompt: You are a financial analyst and business consultant specializing in startup financial modeling. Create realistic, data-driven financial missionions with clear assumptions and scenarios. Focus on practical financial planning and risk assessment.

nodes.title: Marketing & Sales Strategy
nodes.description: Develop comprehensive marketing and sales strategies including customer acquisition, pricing strategy, and distribution channels.
nodes.customPrompt: You are a marketing strategist with expertise in go-to-market strategies for startups and growing businesses. Focus on practical, scalable marketing approaches with clear customer acquisition strategies and measurable outcomes.

nodes.title: Operations Plan
nodes.description: Define operational processes, organizational structure, staffing requirements, and key operational milestones.

nodes.title: Risk Assessment
nodes.description: Identify potential business risks, assess their impact and probability, and develop mitigation strategies.

nodes.title: Executive Summary
nodes.description: Create a compelling executive summary that captures the key elements of the business plan in a concise, engaging format.

nodes.title: Final Business Plan Document
nodes.description: Compile all sections into a comprehensive, professional business plan document with proper formatting and structure.

nodes.title: Business Plan Review & Validation
nodes.description: Conduct final review of the business plan for completeness, accuracy, and persuasiveness. Validate all assumptions and missionions.
